page.title: 18Ashbourne Carnival.
page.content: In the summer every year there is a {Carnival}in Ashbourne. In it there are {floats, bands, and vintage cars.}The floats are lorries decorated in different ways with themes such as Robin Hood, a Lion Hunt and Lilac Time. The{Carnival Queen}was Tina Wren. She was very pretty. The bands were very good. The Highland Band was best. They were all dressed up in red tartan. After the procession everybody goes to the park where there are a lot of{stalls}selling things like jewellery, pots, scarves, hot dogs and refreshments. There are sideshows like tombola, raffles, and hoopla. There was a Bouncing Castle, a train and donkey rides. The Carnival is organised by{Ashbourne Round Table. The money raised goes to{charity.
